[[File:Weapon Plus World War IV Vol 1 1 Textless.jpg|left|thumb]]
While initially reported to have been performed on various ethnic groups and prisoners,{{r|New X-Men #130}} '''Weapon IV''' -- also known as '''Project Sulfur''' -- was spearheaded by [[Theodore Sallis (Earth-616)|Ted Sallis]] and developed the [[SO-2 Serum]] that turned him into the [[Man-Thing]].{{r|Wolverine & Captain America: Weapon Plus Vol 1 1}}
